Text:
Not fake at all.  This is absolutely this exact movie.

BUT...  It is in english with RUSSIAN AUDIO DUBBED OVER THE ENGLISH.

As such, it's rather unwatchable to someone like myself, that does not speak Russian.  Even if I did, the fact that the english is audible under the Russian is annoying.

Still, it IS this movie, and the video quality is nice.

If someone could overdub ALL the audio with the english version we'd really have something here.
Fu%ing dickhead there,s plenty decent copies around .Why bother .
